sentences.sContent: I'm going to buy a surfboard and learn to surf.
sentences.sCn: 我要去买个冲浪板来学冲浪。

phrases.pCn: 上网；上网冲浪；网上冲浪；浏览因特网

words.tran: 冲浪运动员，乘冲浪板冲浪的人

trans.tranCn: 冲浪； 冲浪， 浏览
trans.tranOther: to ride on waves while standing on a special board

trans.tranCn: 拍岸浪花；拍岸涛声；拍岸碎浪
trans.tranOther: the white substance that forms on top of waves as they move towards the shore
